      • moveStep

        public void moveStep(int indexInit,
                     int indexFinal)
              throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Takes the indexInit th step and move it to the indexFinal th place . All the concerned steps are swaped to the left or the right if necessary
        Parameters:
        indexInit - The initial index of the step to move
        indexFinal - The new index of the step to move
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException

      • addIngredient

        public void addIngredient(Product product,
                          float quantity)
        Add an ingredient in the ingredients list. If the product is already present, the older quantity is erased by the new one
        Parameters:
        product - The new product
        quantity - The quantity of the product needed in the recipe
